LanguageData.koisama.Numbers.Title: Numbers!
LanguageData.koisama.Numbers.ClickToToggle: Click to select metric or pawn type.
LanguageData.Numbers_SetAsDefaultExplanation:
Set the current view as the default for this type of view ({0}).

This view will then be used for new colonies.

Can be deleted in the mod settings:
 [Menu] => [Options] => [Mod settings] => [Numbers].
LanguageData.Numbers_NoDefaultStoredForThisView: There are no defaults stored for the currently viewed pawn type.
LanguageData.Numbers_ShowMoreInfoThanVanilla: Show needs and jobs even where it would normally be hidden.
LanguageData.Numbers_coolerThanTheWildlifeTab: Numbers! is everything I ever wanted from the "Wildlife" tab and I want it to take over.
LanguageData.Numbers_MaxTableHeight: Maximum height of the "Numbers" tab that is allowed to use.
